eu.cqse.check.framework.core

Class CheckImplementationBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.cqse.check.framework.core.CheckImplementationBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AvoidUnusedPrivateMethodsCheck, BadAssignmentsCheck, CLikeFieldUsageCheckBase, CommentCheckBase, EntityCheckBase, NumberOfImportsCheck, StaticVariablesInitCheck, UnusedImportsCheck

    public abstract class CheckImplementationBase
extends Object
    Abstract base class for custom checks. A check is instantiated and initialized with a check context when its executing processor is set up. It is destroyed, when the executing processor has finished execution.
    Version:
    $Rev: 55561 $
    Author:
    $Author: hummelb $

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected ICheckContext context
      The check context that is used to access custom check specific functionality.

      • setContext

        public void setContext(ICheckContext context)

      • select

        protected List<ShallowEntity> select(String xPathExpression)
                              throws CheckException
        Selects all shallow entities from the abstract syntax tree, that match the given xpath-expression. This method can be used, if the executing check requests the ECheckParameter.ABSTRACT_SYNTAX_TREE parameter.
        Throws:
        CheckException

      • select

                                     String xPathExpression)

        CheckException
